data.title: Dobbs Tire & Auto Centers
data.meta_description: Dobbs has been a locally and family-owned tire and auto service retailer, committed to excellence, and proudly serving the St. Louis and surrounding areas since 1976.
data.text:
Since the day the Dobbs family opened its first store in 1976 in the Yorkshire Plaza, in south Saint Louis, Dobbs Tire & Auto Centers has grown to employ more than 650 associates at 43 stores across Missouri and Illinois. In addition to its comprehensive line of quality tire brands, the team at Dobbs offers drivers complete automotive services, including routine, preventive, and complex diagnostic and engine repairs.

The family’s commitment to service excellence is the hallmark of the company culture, which is evident daily at the store level as associates assist customers with properly maintaining and repairing their vehicles, including cars, light trucks, vans, SUVs, hybrids, and EVs.

Beyond their commitment to satisfying the needs of their customers, the Dobbs family of associates actively supports many institutions, organizations, and charities in the local communities in which they and their families reside.

As Dustin Dobbs, fourth generation company chief executive officer explains, “At Dobbs, each of our associates has a stake in the success of our company, and the welfare of the communities in which we live and work. Together, we do our best to make a positive difference for our customers by providing them with high quality tire brands and expert automotive services provided right, the first time, at the most competitive prices in town. Together, we proudly deliver on our nearly 50-year promise to drivers that they can always ‘Depend on Dobbs.’”
